description:
Yuuri`s nephew, Kazuya, licks and rubs Yuuri`s innocent body. He rapes her and takes her virginity. She has an intense climax and urinates on her "older sister`s" desk. She complies with these and more indecent orders that she is given.
She is forced to give one of her students a handjob during class and to perform fellatio while naked in the audiovisual room. Yuuri is humiliated in nearly every way imaginable, and Kazuya points out her penchant for exhibitionism.
"C-Cut it out! I only feel shame from doing this!"
Yuuri vehemently denies it, but as Kazuya forces her to sexually service him on camera, despite Yuuri`s continued denial, a smile of pure ecstasy floats to the surface.
Source: hanime

titles.title: Conquête & ouverture de fenêtre pour Yuuri Kamiyama
はしたない学園長・優理~窓際ハメる征服露出♥
